subject: Football

Organized Labor
lead_paragraph: Since June, the league and the referees’ union have been bickering over paychecks and pensions and replacement officials have made their debut.
snippet: Since June, the league and the referees’ union have been bickering over paychecks and pensions and replacement officials have made their debut.
